isis.stitle: FRONT NON-DRIVE STEERING AXLE: ROCKWELL - ASSEMBLE - BRONZE AND EASY STEER BUSHINGS IN THE KNUCKLE

svcproc.title: BRONZE AND EASY STEER BUSHINGS IN THE KNUCKLE

note.para: On FF-, FG- and FL-Series axles, the bushings can be installed without a press. Use the Bushing INSTALLING and SIZING KIT to install and ream the bushings. Refer to SPECIAL TOOLS.

svcprocinfo.para: Use a press with a minimum capacity of five tons.
Make sure the knuckle does not move when installing the bushings.
Ream the bronze and Easy Steer bushings after installation.

step1.para: Install the top bushing first.
Put the knuckle in a press so that the top of the knuckle is toward the top of the press. Make sure the top of the bores are parallel to the top of the press.
Put the bushing in the bore. Make sure the hole in the bushing is aligned with the hole in the bore ( Figure 19).
Use the installation tool and press the bushing 1/8 inch (3mm) into the bore. Release the pressure. Make sure the bushing is straight.
Press the bushing until there is 0.135 to 0.165 inch (3.5 to 4.0mm) between the bottom of the bushing and the bottom of the top bore ( Figure 20).
Turn the knuckle over so that the bottom of the knuckle is toward the top of the press. Make sure the bore for the bushing is parallel to the top of the press.
Put the bottom bushing in the bore. Make sure the hole in the bushing is aligned with the hole in the bore.
Use the installation tool and press the bushing 1/8 inch (3mm) into the bore. Release the pressure. Make sure the bushing is pressed straight.
Press the bushing until there is 0.135 to 0.165 inch (3.5 to 4.0mm) between the bottom of the bushing and the top of the bottom bore ( Figure 21).
Ream the bushings. Refer to SPECIAL TOOLS for the correct BUSHING INSTALLING AND SIZING KIT.
Install the top knuckle bushing first.
Put the knuckle in a press so that the top of the knuckle is toward the top of the press. Make sure tops of the bores are parallel to the top of the press.
Put the bushing in the bore.
Use the installation tool and press the bushing 1/8 inch (3mm) into the bore. Release the pressure. Make sure the bushing is pressed straight.
Press the bushing until the top is 0.352 to 0.382 inch (8.94 to 9.70mm) below the top of the knuckle ( Figure 22).
Turn the knuckle over so that the bottom of the knuckle is toward the top of the press. Make sure the bore is parallel to the top of the press.
Put the bottom bushing in the bore.
Use the installation tool and press the bushing 1/8 inch (3mm) into the bore. Release the pressure. Make sure the bushing is straight.
Press the bushing until the top is 0.352 to 0.382 inch (8.94 to 9.70mm) below the top of the knuckle machined surface ( Figure 22).
Ream the bushings. Refer to SPECIAL TOOLS for the correct bushing installing and sizing kit.
